title: abaddon in dota2, some of the most fun i had in a while.
body: Abaddon in dota2 is so op, when he gets low he heals ALL damage he recieves for 7 seconds, and the cooldown for this passive is 40 seconds and he also heals for 35 percent of damage allies recieve for it's duration, and he is super fast and tanky and does lots of damage, and there is no way in the game to by-pass and kill him for it's duration. and his mana costs are low. so he can go into enemy team 1v3, it's trynds ult but on crack, and 40 second cooldown and on a champ that is legitly tanky and does lots of damage.
